name: voice/start
description: Start voice chat session for real-time audio communication with AI

params.name: room
params.description: Room ID or name to join (defaults to 'general')

params.name: model
params.description: LLM model to use for responses (defaults to system default)

params.name: voice
params.description: TTS voice ID for AI responses

results.name: wsUrl
results.description: WebSocket URL to connect for audio streaming

examples.description: Start voice chat in general room
